import './checkout.styles.scss' import { useContext } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../../contexts/cart.context' import './checkout.styles.scss' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' const Checkout = () => { const {cartItems, totalPrice} = useContext(CartContext) return (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map((cartItem) => { return }) }
Total: ${totalPrice}
) } export default Checkout
